DOC.brief_summary: Aim: to assess relative effectiveness of a high and a low intensity intervention for smoking cessation support in a dental clinic setting. Method: 300 smokers were randomly assigned to support with either low (LTI) or high treatment intensity (HTI). Main outcome measures were self-reported point-prevalence and continuous abstinence (≥183 days).
DOC.brief_title: Smoking Cessation in a Dentistry Setting
DOC.criteria: Adult daily smokers in the county of Västmanland Reading difficulties Not fluent in the Swedish language
